<small>Also see: [[H7959]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְוָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==quietness, ease==; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.122.7|Ps 122:7]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְוִת‎</span> [[Ezek.16.49|Ezek 16:49]]; [[Prov.1.32|Prov 1:32]] plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְוֺתַ֫יִךְ‎</span> [[Jer.22.21|Jer 22:21]](<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְוָתֵךְ‎</span> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]); — ***quietnees, peace***, [[Prov.17.1|Prov 17:1]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span>), [[Ps.122.7|Ps 122:7]], (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלוֺם‎</span>); ***ease, careless security***, [[Ezek.16.49|Ezek 16:49]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלְוַת הַשְׁקֵט‎</span>), [[Prov.1.32|Prov 1:32]] ***prosperity***, [[Jer.22.21|Jer 22:21]]; [[Dan.8.25|Dan 8:25]]; [[Dan.11.21|Dan 11:21]]; [[Dan.11.24|Dan 11:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***in*** (time of) ***security*** (of sudden attack), if not ***unawares*** ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] and others); compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> literally ***out of quiet***, i.e. ***suddenly, unawares*** (e.g. 1 Macc 1:30 = <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐξάπινα</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן שִׁלְיָא‎</span> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Prov.3.25|Prov 3:25]]; [[Prov.6.15|Prov 6:15]] ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתְאֹם‎</span>), [[Ps.30.7|Ps 30:7]] see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫לוּ‎</span>]. AboveI. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁלָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֵלָה‎</span>.
